jhelp.util.filter

Class FileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      • jhelp.util.filter.FileFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.FileFilter, java.io.FilenameFilter

    public class FileFilter
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
implements java.io.FilenameFilter, java.io.FileFilter
    File filter on extention.
    You can add a second filter to filter more

    Last modification : 23 avr. 2009
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
    JHelp
